summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3615 for the improvement of Leo Street, from Beacon Avenue to 57th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44660, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
